column4: doesn't work in Jaunty or Karmic unless you screw around with xorg.conf
If you're doing the copy-ISO-contents-to-USB route, a little over 700MB for a regular Ubuntu Live CD, and 1GB for Netbook Remix, I think.
more if you want a persistant live environment
I've got a 4 gb drive, haven't decided if I want it persistent or not.
